source language text: Oh, by the way, I make yellowcake in my garage, so my nuclear program is as advanced as the Iranians.
target language text: O, e tamén produzo óxido de uranio no meu garaxe, así que o meu programa nuclear é tan avanzado coma o iraní.
label: meu/meus

source language text: Now, my breakthrough came in a very unlikely place, possibly the most unlikely place for innovation -- my high school biology class, the absolute stifler of innovation.
target language text: O meu achado chegou nun lugar insólito, no lugar menos probable para a innovación: a clase de bioloxía de secundaria, o inhibidor absoluto da innovación.
label: meu/meus

source language text: In particular, in my lab in the Department of Brain and Cognitive Sciences at MIT, I have spent the past decade trying to understand the mystery of how children learn so much from so little so quickly.
target language text: En concreto, no meu laboratorio no Dpto. de Cerebro e Ciencias Cognitivas, no MIT, pasei a última década intentando entender o misterio de por que os nenos aprenden tanto, a partir de tan pouco, e tan rápido.
label: meu/meus

source language text: For years, I tried desperately to cultivate in my kids a love of reading.
target language text: Durante anos, tratei desesperadamente de cultivar nos meus nenos
label: meu/meus

source language text: My doctor asked if I'd like to speak with a mental health professional about my stress and anxiety.
target language text: O meu doutor preguntoume se quería falar cun profesional da saúde mental sobre o meu estrés e a miña ansiedade.
label: meu/meus

source language text: And then I'll get to do my cookbook."
target language text: E logo farei o meu libro de cociña"
label: meu/meus

source language text: And I referenced that at the end of my last talk.
target language text: E eu fixen referencia ao tema cara a fin do meu discurso
label: meu/meus

source language text: People would come over to talk to my grandparents, and after they would leave, my mother would come over to us, and she'd say, "Do you know who that was?
target language text: A xente viña á casa a falar cos meus avós e despois de marchar, a miña nai achegábase a nós, e dicía: "Sabedes quen era?
label: miña/miñas

source language text: My mother was an administrator.
target language text: A miña nai era administradora.
label: miña/miñas

source language text: This could be my little assessment.
target language text: Esta podería ser a miña breve valoración.
label: miña/miñas

source language text: I'd like to talk today about how we can change our brains and our society.
target language text: Hoxe gustaríame falar sobre como podemos cambiar os nosos cerebros e a nosa sociedade.
label: podedes/podemos

source language text: But it turned out that we can actually get sleep at a much more important level.
target language text: Pero resultou que podemos chegar a ver o sono nun nivel moito máis importante.
label: podedes/podemos

source language text: And how -- (Applause) And how can we empower survivors if we're making them feel less than?
target language text: E como -- (Aplausos) E como podemos axudar ás vítimas se facemos que se sintan inferirores?
label: podedes/podemos

source language text: So my second dream is that I think we can look to the next 30 years as a time to change the food system again.
target language text: Así que o meu segundo soño é que creo que podemos mirar os próximos 30 anos como un prazo para cambiar outra vez o sistema alimentario.
label: podedes/podemos

source language text: I can't do anything to save the world."
target language text: Non podo facer nada para salvar o mundo."
label: poderemos/podes/podo

source language text: Putting a sticker over your web cam is probably the best thing you can do for your privacy in terms of bang for buck.
target language text: Poñer unha pegatina na cámara web é posiblemente o mellor que podes facer pola túa privacidade en termos de prezo-calidade.
label: poderemos/podes/podo

source language text: How can it be that this thought in my brain can move material objects?
target language text: Como pode ser que un pensamento no meu cerebro poida mover obxectos materiais?
label: poida/poidamos/poidan

source language text: So we're talking about at least a year until there's vaccine available that can be used in many populations.
target language text: Así que terá que pasar polo menos un ano ata que haxa unha vacina dispoñible que as distintas poboacións poidan usar.
label: poida/poidamos/poidan

source language text: If there is publication bias, if small negative trials have gone missing in action, you can see it on one of these graphs.
target language text: Se hai un nesgo na publicación se os pequenos ensaios negativos desapareceron, pódese ver nunha destas gráficas.
label: estas

source language text: But guess what's really crazy: the way these rating agencies are run.
target language text: Pero o que é en verdade para tolear é o modo no que funcionan estas axencias.
label: estas

source language text: I put these things, a whole dozen of them, into the world.
target language text: Presento estas cousas, unha ducia delas, ao mundo.
label: estas

source language text: And to enable our warriors to use these weapons, we employ the most cutting-edge training methods.
target language text: E para que os nosos guerreiros usen estas armas, utilizamos métodos de adestramento de vangarda.
label: estas

source language text: When I first started researching romantic love, I found these madness metaphors everywhere.
target language text: Cando primeiramente empecei a buscar sobre o amor romántico, encontrei estas metáforas sobre a loucura en todas partes.
label: estas

source language text: And every time I do one of these investigations, I still get so excited, and I'm like 75 into them, and still I swear on number 76, I'm going to be like, "This is the one!"
target language text: E cada vez que fago unha destas investigacións, sigo a emocionarme, e a pesar de que xa fixen como 75, xúrovos que na 76 vou estar, "Esta é a boa!"
label: estas

source language text: I think a lot of us feel boxed in by how we use these words.
target language text: Creo que moitos nos sentimos limitados por como usamos estas palabras.
label: estas

source language text: What I mean by psychopathic killer are these people, these types of people.
target language text: Cando digo asasino psicópata refírome a estas persoas, este tipo de persoas.
label: estas

source language text: And this is a question. The National Institute on Aging actually gave us a questionnaire to give these centenarians.
target language text: E esta é a cuestión. O Instituto Nacional do Envellecemento deunos un cuestionario para dar a estas persoas centenarias.
label: estas

source language text: And honestly, where we've gone through over the last 11 years, through an attempt to find ways of turning circuits and cells and parts and pathways of the brain on and off, both to understand the science and also to confront some of the issues that face us all as humans.
target language text: E, honestamente, por onde pasamos nos últimos 11 anos na busca de maneiras de acender e apagar circuítos e células e rutas do cerebro, tanto para entende-la ciencia, como para facerlles fronte a algúns dos problemas
label: maneira/maneiras

source language text: But when there is something that I really do want to do that progeria gets in the way of, like marching band or umpiring, we always find a way to do it, and that just shows that progeria isn't in control of my life.
target language text: Pero cando hai algo que realmente quero facer e a proxeria se interpón no meu camiño, como tocar nunha banda, ou arbitrar, sempre atopamos a maneira de facelo, e isto demostra que a proxeria non controla a miña vida.
label: maneira/maneiras

source language text: This was a way to take really complicated ideas and make them memorable and knowledgeable, so people got it.
target language text: Era un xeito de expresar ideas moi complexas e facelas doadas de recoñecer e lembrar, para que a xente as entendera.
label: xeito/xeitos

source language text: Now, it doesn't have to be that way.
target language text: Pero non ten por que ser dese xeito.
label: xeito/xeitos

source language text: And I actually think it works the same way.
target language text: E penso que funciona do mesmo xeito.
label: xeito/xeitos

source language text: But we do provide on that website a standardized list of definitions, because it's hard to attack a behavior in the right way if we're not all sharing a definition of what that behavior is.
target language text: Mais o que si ofrecemos é unha lista estandarizada de definicións, porque é complicado atacar un comportamento no xeito correcto se non compartimos unha definición do que ese comportamento é.
label: xeito/xeitos

source language text: And he said, "She read it once and then she read it again."
target language text: E dicía: "leuno unha vez, e despois o volveu ler."
label: despois

source language text: Then instead of deleting those positive outliers, what I intentionally do is come into a population like this one and say, why?
target language text: Entón, en vez de eliminar a eses estraños positivos, o que fago eu de maneira intencionada é dirixirme a unha poboación coma esta e dicir "por que?" Por que algúns de vostedes están tan por enriba da curva
label: entón

source language text: So how, then, does the brain solve its waste clearance problem?
target language text: Entón como soluciona o cerebro o problema da limpeza dos seus residuos?
label: entón

source language text: If I can watch which lure you use to catch a fish, or I can watch how you flake your hand axe to make it better, or if I follow you secretly to your mushroom patch, I can benefit from your knowledge and wisdom and skills, and maybe even catch that fish before you do.
target language text: Se podo observar que isca usas para pescar, ou podo observar como fas lascas coa túa machada para perfeccionala, ou se secretamente te sigo até o teu roteiro de cogomelos podo beneficiarme do teu coñecemento, sabedoría e habilidades e incluso pescar ese peixe antes ca ti.
label: teu/teus/túa/túas

source language text: (Laughter) And I said, "Solomon, Your email intrigues me."
target language text: (Risos) E dixen "Solomon, o teu correo intrígame."
label: teu/teus/túa/túas

source language text: The one thing that everybody appreciates and wants when they're speaking is to know that what they say matters so much you might actually change your mind.
target language text: O único que todo o mundo aprecia e quere cando está falando é saber que o que di importa tanto que pode provocar o teu cambio de opinión.
label: teu/teus/túa/túas

source language text: So with increased exercise over your lifetime, you're not going to cure dementia or Alzheimer's disease, but what you're going to do is you're going to create the strongest, biggest hippocampus and prefrontal cortex so it takes longer for these diseases to actually have an effect.
target language text: Así que con máis exercicio ao longo da vosa vida non ides curar a demencia ou o alzhéimer, pero si ides facer o hipocampo e o córtex prefrontal máis grandes e fortes polo que a estas enfermidades lles levará máis tempo facer efecto.
label: vosa/vosas/voso

source language text: So finally, to break the deadlock, the Philistines send their mightiest warrior down into the valley floor, and he calls out and he says to the Israelites, "Send your mightiest warrior down, and we'll have this out, just the two of us."
target language text: Ó final, para saír deste estancamento, os palestinos mandaron ó seu guerreiro máis forte ó val, onde chama ós isrealitas e di "Enviade aquí abaixo ó voso mellor guerreiro e trataremos este asunto, só nós os dous."
label: vosa/vosas/voso

source language text: To give you a feel for this idea, imagine the following scenario: You walk into your child's day care center.
target language text: Para que comprendades esta idea, imaxinade o seguinte escenario: Entrades na gardería da vosa filla.
label: vosa/vosas/voso

source language text: Gene patent proponents say, "See? We didn't patent the gene in your body, we patented an isolated gene."
target language text: Os defensores disto din: "Non patentamos os xenes do voso corpo, patentamos os xenes illados".
label: vosa/vosas/voso

source language text: So, for example, if one little component of your worldview is the idea that kittens are adorable, then when you see this, you'll react like this.
target language text: Se, por exemplo, un pequeno compoñente da vosa visión do mundo é a idea de que os gatiños son adorables, entón, ao verdes isto, reaccionaredes así.
label: vosa/vosas/voso

source language text: Predictions link the sensations in your body that give you these simple feelings with what's going on around you in the world so that you know what to do.
target language text: As predicións conectan as sensacións corporais proporcionadas por eses sentimentos simples co que ocorre ao voso arredor para que saibades o que facer.
label: vosa/vosas/voso

source language text: Take it from me: Under the bed is not a good hiding spot.
target language text: Facédeme caso: ese non é un bo escondedoiro.

source language text: As far as I was concerned, life was pretty good.
target language text: Para min, a vida era bastante boa.
label: bo/boa/boas/bos

source language text: We're given the impression that these are the things that we need to go after in order to have a good life.
target language text: Dános a impresión de que debemos perseguir estas cousas para ter unha boa vida.
label: bo/boa/boas/bos

source language text: (Laughter) Now, there's a really good reason why I don't allow pundits on my show: Because they're really boring.
target language text: (Risos) Hai unha boa razón para non permitir expertos no meu show: son moi aburridos.
label: bo/boa/boas/bos

source language text: Now, here's a good example of spiritual practices and geographical realities combining to bring a distinct emotion into life and make it disappear again.
target language text: Este é un bo exemplo de como a sinerxía entre prácticas espirituais e realidades xeográficas dá lugar a unha emoción diferenciada e a fai desaparecer de novo.
label: bo/boa/boas/bos

source language text: And Odysseus does his best job playacting and says, "Untie me. Untie me.
target language text: Ulises fai a súa mellor interpretación e di: "Desatádeme. Desatádeme.
label: mellor/mellores

source language text: So I came to work for California Pacific Medical Center, one of the best private hospitals in Northern California, and together, we opened a clinic in Bayview-Hunters Point, one of the poorest, most underserved neighborhoods in San Francisco.
target language text: Así que fun a traballar para o California Pacific Medical Center, un dos mellores hospitais privados do norte de California, e xuntos abrimos unha clínica en Bayview-Hunters Point, un dos barrios máis pobres e desfavorecidos de San Francisco.
label: mellor/mellores

source language text: If I had to say something to him, it would be, "Be yourself, and do your best."
target language text: Se tivese que dicirlle algo, sería: "Sé ti mesmo, e faino o mellor que poidas."
label: mellor/mellores

source language text: The next 10 years may be the most important, and the next 10,000 years the best chance our species will have to protect what remains of the natural systems that give us life.
target language text: Os próximos 10 anos poden ser os máis importantes, e os próximos 10.000 anos a mellor oportunidade qua a nosa especie terá para protexer o que queda dos sistemas naturais que nos dan vida.
label: mellor/mellores

source language text: We think the best way to get these missing years is to look at the cultures around the world that are actually experiencing them, areas where people are living to age 100 at rates up to 10 times greater than we are, areas where the life expectancy is an extra dozen years, the rate of middle age mortality is a fraction of what it is in this country.
target language text: Cremos que a mellor maneira de obter estes anos perdidos é observar as culturas de todo o mundo que os están vivindo, áreas onde as persoas viven ata os 100 anos nunha proporción 10 veces maior cá nosa, áreas onde a esperanza de vida é de doce anos mais, a taxa de mortalidade a mediana idade é unha fracción do que é neste país.
label: mellor/mellores

source language text: The next experiment was slightly different.
target language text: O seguinte experimento foi un pouco diferente.
label: diferente/diferentes

source language text: Gender and class are different forms of oppression.
target language text: Xénero e clase son diferentes formas de opresión.
label: diferente/diferentes

source language text: So the great project of our generation, it seems to me, is to build for the first time, out of a global ethic and our global ability to communicate and organize together, a truly global society, built on that ethic but with institutions that can serve that global society and make for a different future.
target language text: Entón o gran proxecto da noxa xeración, paréceme, é construir por primeira vez dende unha ética global e a nosa capacidade global de comunicación e de organización conxunta, unha sociedade auténticamente global, construida sobre esa ética pero con institucións que poidan servir á sociedade global e fagan un futuro diferente.
label: diferente/diferentes

source language text: It emphasizes how we are different rather than how we are similar.
target language text: Enfatiza o que nos fai diferentes no canto das nosas similitudes.
label: diferente/diferentes

source language text: So, most of them will fire when I'm touched in different locations. Different neurons for different locations.
target language text: A maioría delas activaranse cando me tocan en distintas zonas. Neuronas diferentes para zonas diferentes.
label: diferente/diferentes

source language text: High doses of adversity not only affect brain structure and function, they affect the developing immune system, developing hormonal systems, and even the way our DNA is read and transcribed.
target language text: As doses altas de adversidade non afectan só á estrutura e ás funcións do cerebro, senón tamén ao sistema inmunolóxico, ao sistema endócrino, e incluso ao xeito no que se le e transcribe o noso ADN.
label: incluso

source language text: I realize that even the most traumatic event of my life is still a testament to my privilege, because I can talk about it without getting ostracized, or even killed.
target language text: Son consciente de que incluso o evento máis traumático da miña vida segue sendo un testemuño do meu privilexio, porque podo falar sobre isto sen ser excluída, ou incluso asasinada.
label: incluso

source language text: And of course, we'll be even richer than that.
target language text: E naturalmente, nos seremos incluso máis ricos que iso.
label: incluso

source language text: Even about seemingly personal and visceral things like who you're attracted to, you will start aping the beliefs of the people around you without even realizing that that's what you're doing.
target language text: Mesmo en cousas aparentemente persoais e viscerais como quen nos atrae, comezamos a imitar as crenzas das persoas do noso arredor sen darnos nin conta do que estamos a facer.
label: mesmo

source language text: So, collectively, now we think we have enough evidence to say that neurogenesis is a target of choice if we want to improve memory formation or mood, or even prevent the decline associated with aging, or associated with stress.
target language text: Así, en conxunto, pensamos que temos evidencia de abondo para afirmar que a neuroxénese é unha clara alternativa se queremos mellorar a formación de memorias e o estado anímico, ou mesmo previr o declive asociado ao avellentamento, ou asociado ao estrés.
label: mesmo

source language text: My belief is that it's almost too painful to articulate our aspirations for our healthcare system, or even admit that we have any at all.
target language text: Creo que é demasiado difícil expresar as nosas aspiracións para o noso sistema de saúde, ou tan sequera admitir que temos algunha.
label: sequera

source language text: It doesn't even occur to us that we should.
target language text: Nin sequera se nos ocorre que deberiamos facelo.
label: sequera

source language text: Now, Sylvia Browne -- just to show you -- she actually gets 700 dollars for a 20 minute reading over the telephone, she doesn't even go there in person, and you have to wait up to two years because she's booked ahead that amount of time.
target language text: Ben, Sylvia Brown (só para ensinárvolo) cobra 700 dólares por un contacto a través do teléfono de 20 minutos. Nin sequera vai alí en persoa e tes que esperar ata dous anos porque xa ten reservas para todo ese tempo.

target language text: (Risas) Nacín en 1985, seis anos antes de que China anunciase a sua política do fillo único.
label: fillo/fillos

source language text: We wanted to know if babies and young children could understand this really profound thing about other people.
target language text: Nós queriamos saber se os bebés e os nenos pequenos podían entender esta idea tan complexa sobre outras persoas.
label: neno/nenos

source language text: So in these circumstances, the children are using statistics to find out about the world, but after all, scientists also do experiments, and we wanted to see if children are doing experiments.
target language text: Nestas circunstancias, os nenos fan estatísticas para desvelar cousas sobre o mundo. Pero os científicos experimentan, despois de todo, e queriamos ver se os nenos experimentaban tamén.

source language text: If we look at babies and young children, we see something very different.
target language text: Se observamos os bebés e nenos, vemos algo moi distinto.
label: neno/nenos

source language text: They take more risks than children or adults, and they are particularly prone to taking risks when they're with their friends. There's an important drive to become independent from one's parents and to impress one's friends in adolescence.
target language text: Fano. Corren máis riscos que os nenos ou os adultos, e son particularmente proclives a asumir riscos cando están cos amigos. Hai un forte pulo para independizarse dos pais e impresionar aos amigos na adolescencia.
label: neno/nenos

source language text: Children are especially sensitive to this repeated stress activation, because their brains and bodies are just developing.
target language text: Os nenos son especialmente sensibles a esta activación repetitiva polo estrés, porque os seus cerebros e corpos aínda se están desenvolvendo.
label: neno/nenos

source language text: For decades, the prevalence estimates remained stable at just three or four children in 10,000.
target language text: Durante décadas, calculouse unha prevalencia estable do autismo de tres ou catro nenos por cada dez mil.
label: neno/nenos

source language text: But that is not enough, because compassion, which activates the motor cortex, means that we aspire, we actually aspire to transform suffering.
target language text: Pero non abonda, xa que a compaixón, que activa o motor cortex, quere dicir que aspiramos a transformar o sufrimento.

target language text: Isto non quere dicir que a computación sexa arbitraria.

label: dicir

label: dicir

target language text: Co tempo vólvese transparente, así que o que finalmente vai pasar é que estes rostros volverán a verse un pouco.

source language text: (Laughter) -- and maybe a little bit of a march from "Aida" when you come into the hall.
target language text: (Sorrisos) -- e quizais un pouco dunha marcha de Aida cando entrades na sala. Pero á marxe diso, nunca a escoitades.
label: pouco

source language text: The reality, unfortunately, is a little different, and it has a lot to do with trust, or a lack of it.
target language text: A realidade, desafortunadamente, é un pouco diferente, e ten moito que ver coa confianza, ou a falta dela.
label: pouco

source language text: This has become my favorite way of videographing just about any space.
target language text: Esta é a miña forma favorita de videografar sobre calquera espazo.
label: calquera

source language text: This is old information we've known since about the 80s, yet there's no medicine I can prescribe to a patient with this or any of the numerous solid tumors caused by these three ...
target language text: Sabemos esta información xa dende os anos 70, pero aínda non se pode recetar unha menciña a un paciente con este ou calquera dos outros tumores que causan estes tres xinetes
label: calquera

source language text: They can express their opinion on any channel at any time, and they do.
target language text: Poden dar as súas opinións mediante calquera canal en calquera momento, e fano.
label: calquera

source language text: As if depression is something that could be remedied by any of the contents found in a first-aid kit.
target language text: Como se a depresión puidese remediarse con calquera dos contidos dun kit de primeiros auxilios.
label: calquera

source language text: More than any other bit of technology, the computer is a mirror that reflects any idea of the human we teach it.
target language text: Máis que calquera outra tecnoloxía, o ordenador é un espello que reflicte calquera idea do ser humano que lle ensinemos.
label: calquera

source language text: We not only have Bing searches, but if you use Internet Explorer to do searches at Google, Yahoo, Bing, any ...
target language text: Non só temos as buscas de Bing, se usas Internet Explorer para facer buscas en Google, Yahoo, Bing, calquera...
label: calquera

source language text: But not any Spaniard.
target language text: Mais non un español calquera.
label: calquera

source language text: When you looked in her eyes, any girl at the age of eleven is looking forward to the future, but there was an unreachable sadness in that girl’s eyes and if I could have translated that to the rest of the world for that moment, I believe that all the work that it had done for the global HIV/AIDS fund would be rewarded by people being prepared to make donations.
target language text: cando a miras ós ollos, calquera nena de once anos está a esperar o futuro, pero había unha tristeza inalcanzable nos ollos desta nena que si eu puidese traducir ó resto o do mundo ese momento, Eu creo que todo o traballo que se fixera polo fondo global do VIH/SIDA veríase recompensado por xente disposta a facer donacións.
label: calquera

source language text: I can't give you any solutions.
target language text: Non podo darvos ningunha solución.
label: ningún/ningunha

source language text: Well, there won't be any fish except for minnows, and the water will be pretty dirty, and all those kinds of things and full of mercury, etc., etc.
target language text: Ben, non haberá ningún peixe excepto peixiños, e a auga estará moi porca, e todo ese tipo de cousas, e cheo de mercurio...
label: ningún/ningunha

source language text: But if you think about this, this is actually -- the "Freakonomics" authors wrote about this -- that more people die on a per mile basis from drunk walking than from drunk driving.
target language text: Aínda que si o pensades, en realidade -os autores do "Freakonomics" escribiron sobre isto- morre máis xente por andar bébedo que por conducir bébedo.
label: realidade

source language text: Maybe that's because you don't actually have acne.
target language text: Talvez é que en realidade non tes acne.
label: realidade

source language text: Well, actually, this is one of the nearby galaxies.
target language text: Pero en realidade, é unha das galaxias próximas.
label: realidade

source language text: So it's actually a little bit like how you or I, we put off our household chores during the work week when we don't have time to get to it, and then we play catch up on all the cleaning that we have to do when the weekend rolls around.
target language text: Polo que en realidade é un pouco coma nós, cando atrasamos as tarefas da casa durante a semana, cando non temos tempo de facelas, e despois poñémonos ao día e facemos toda a limpeza cando chega a fin de semana.
label: realidade

source language text: This device that I'm driving through the cave was actually creating a three-dimensional model as we drove it.
target language text: Este dispositivo que guío a través da cova en realidade ía creando un modelo tridimensional mentres conduciamos.
label: realidade

source language text: But because it was open source they could do it, and it actually works really beautifully together.
target language text: Pero podían facelo porque era código aberto e, en realidade, funcionou moi ben.
label: realidade

source language text: I actually learned quite a bit about systems of oppression and how they can be blind to one another by talking to black men.
target language text: En realidade, aprendín algo acerca dos sistemas de opresión e de como poden cegarnos mutuamente falando con homes de raza negra.
label: realidade

source language text: It said, actually, a lot of that hormone replacement therapy may be doing more harm than good for many of those women.
target language text: que dicía que realmente a terapia de substitución hormonal podía estar a facerlles máis mal que ben a moitas destas mulleres.
label: realmente

source language text: So as we go in here, what we start to see, apply the physics engine again, we see what's one conversation is actually composed of many smaller ones.
target language text: En canto nos adentramos aquí, o que comezamos a ver, aplicade o mecanismo da física outra vez, vemos que unha conversa está formada realmente por moitas conversas máis pequenas.
label: realmente

source language text: Because if you actually compare the two, Tesla has kind of this mind grab these days, but who actually changed the world?
target language text: Porque se os comparas, Tesla ten unha mente que atrae nestes tempos, pero quen cambiou realmente o mundo?
label: realmente

source language text: And this isn't just a sort of short-term workforce to connect patients to basic resources, it's a next generation healthcare leadership pipeline who've spent two, three, four years in the clinic waiting room talking to patients about their most basic health needs.
target language text: E esta non é só unha especie de forza de traballo a curto prazo para conectar pacientes e recursos básicos, é un reservorio de liderado en saúde da próxima xeración, xente que pasou dous, tres, catro anos nas salas de espera das clínicas falando con pacientes das súas necesidades de saúde máis básicas.
label: próxima/próximo/próximos

source language text: Imagine that next time you go to your doctor and do your next standard blood test, a lab technician extracts a total RNA, which is quite simple today, and puts it in a standard 96-well plate like this one.
target language text: Imaxinade a próxima vez que ides ao médico para facer unha análise de sangue e vos extraen unha mostra total de ARN, bastante sinxelo hoxe en día, e póñena nunha placa de 96 cuncas.
label: próxima/próximo/próximos

source language text: So next time you're lucky enough to fly over the ocean or sail over the ocean, just think -- there are massive sea mountains down there that nobody's ever seen before, and there are beautiful corals.
target language text: A próxima vez que teñades a sorte de voar sobre o océano ou de navegar por el, lembrade que aló abaixo hai enormes montes submarinos que ninguén viu aínda, e fermosos corais.
label: próxima/próximo/próximos

source language text: The other one said, "Will you give me a different color when I have my next baby?"
target language text: Outra dixo: "Daranme unha cor distinta cando teña o meu próximo fillo?"
label: próxima/próximo/próximos

source language text: The next step would be to put this molecule into mice.
target language text: O seguinte paso era inocular a molécula en ratos.
label: seguinte/seguintes

source language text: Over the next several years, they quietly worked with the American Psychiatric Association to broaden the criteria for diagnosis to reflect the diversity of what they called "the autism spectrum."
target language text: Durante os anos seguintes, traballaron discretamente coa Asociación Americana de Psiquiatría para ampliar os criterios de diagnóstico e reflectir a diversidade do que chamaron "espectro autista".
label: seguinte/seguintes

source language text: We lay down this context-dependent memory and learn to repeat the process next time.
target language text: Establecemos este recordo dependente do contexto e aprendemos a repetir o proceso á vez seguinte.
label: seguinte/seguintes

source language text: For the next 42 years, he suffered from nightmares, extreme anxiety in public, isolation, depression.
target language text: Nos 42 anos seguintes sufriu pesadelos, ansiedade extrema en público, illamento, depresión.
label: seguinte/seguintes

source language text: So what if we could take these channelrhodopsins and other molecules and install them on some of these other spared cells and convert them into little cameras?
target language text: Así que, e se collemos as canalrodopsinas e outras moléculas e as poñemos nalgunha destoutras células libres e as convertemos en pequenas cámaras? E, xa que hai moitas destas células no ollo,
label: collemos/coller

source language text: And I was like, "Oh my gosh, if this shape is real, I should be able to take two completely different presentations and overlay it, and it should be true."
target language text: E pensei: "Mi madriña, se esta forma é real, debería poder coller dúas presentacións totalmente diferentes e superpoñelas, e a forma debería ser correcta".
label: collemos/coller

source language text: And so folks like Ami Klin have developed methods to be able to take infants, small babies, and be able to use biomarkers, in this case eye contact and eye tracking, to identify an infant at risk.
target language text: Por iso, xente como Ami Klin desenvolveu métodos para poder coller nenos, bebés, e usar biomarcadores, neste caso, o contacto visual e o seguimento ocular, para identificar un neno en risco.
label: collemos/coller

source language text: As an example, we could have taken the blood of survivors, processed it, and put that plasma back in people to protect them.
target language text: Por exemplo, podiamos coller sangue dos superviventes, procesalo, e volver colocar ese plasma nas persoas sas para as protexer.
label: collemos/coller

source language text: The point is, are we ready to take the path to celebrating ordinary heroes, waiting for the right situation to come along to put heroic imagination into action?
target language text: A cuestión é: estamos listos para coller o camiño que leva a ser heroes normais, a esperar pola situación adecuada para poñer en práctica o imaxinario heroico?
label: collemos/coller

source language text: So I just published a book about introversion, and it took me about seven years to write.
target language text: Así que acabo de publicar un libro sobre a introversión, e levoume 7 anos escribilo.
label: leva/levar/levou

source language text: (Laughter) I don't know about you, but every time I assemble one of those, it takes me much longer, it's much more effortful, it's much more confusing, I put things in the wrong way -- I can't say I enjoy those pieces.
target language text: (Risos) E non sei vós, pero a min, cada vez que monto un deses mobles, lévame moito tempo, moito esforzo, é unha lea moi grande. Poño as pezas ao revés. Non podo dicir que desfrute montándoos.
label: leva/levar/levou

source language text: There's one scene closest to the end, where they have to take a friend to an Anglophone hospital.
target language text: Hai unha escena cara ao final na que teñen que levar un amigo a un hospital anglófono.
label: leva/levar/levou

source language text: It took me a long time to stare down this dark corner of myself, and to ask it questions.
target language text: Levoume tempo sosterlle a mirada a este oscuro recuncho meu, e facerlle preguntas.
label: leva/levar/levou

source language text: Protected areas do rebound, but it takes a long time to restore 50-year-old rockfish or monkfish, sharks or sea bass, or 200-year-old orange roughy.
target language text: As areas protexidas rexenéranse, pero leva moito tempo peixes de roca de 50 anos ou peixes sapo, tiburóns ou corvinas, ou un peixe reloxo alaranxado de 200 anos.
label: leva/levar/levou

source language text: And you can get licensed to bring your drug to market with only data showing that it's better than nothing, which is useless for a doctor like me trying to make a decision.
target language text: E pódese obter licenza para sacar un fármaco ao mercado só cuns datos que digan que é mellor que nada, algo inútil para un médico coma min que intenta tomar unha decisión.
label: fármaco/fármacos

source language text: In fact, 76 percent of all of the trials that were done on this drug were withheld from doctors and patients.
target language text: en realidade, o 76 % dos que se fixeron con este fármaco ocultáronselles a médicos e pacientes.
label: fármaco/fármacos

source language text: But that's not even all of it, because once a drug is approved, tissue engineering techniques can actually help us develop more personalized treatments.
target language text: Isto non é todo, xa que unha vez aprobado un fármaco, a enxeñería de tecidos pode axudarnos a xerar tratamentos personalizados.
label: fármaco/fármacos

source language text: And together, we've managed to identify a critical step in the process and are now testing a new class of drugs which would specifically block this step and stop the disease.
target language text: E xuntos, conseguimos identificar un paso esencial no proceso e estamos agora probando unha nova clase de fármacos para bloquear xusto este paso e deter a enfermidade.
label: fármaco/fármacos

source language text: In that case, you get the infection, you're exposed to the bacteria, you're sick, and then you take, say, an antibiotic which cures it, and those drugs are actually working to kill the bacteria.
target language text: Neste segundo caso, colles a infección, exposte á bacteria, enfermas, e despois tomas un antibiótico que a cura, e eses fármacos traballan para eliminar a bacteria.
label: fármaco/fármacos

source language text: It seemed like a miracle, and ever since, we have been living inside the golden epoch of the miracle drugs.
target language text: Parecía un milagre, e dende entón, estamos vivindo na época dourada dos medicamentos milagre.
label: medicamento/medicamentos

source language text: We need those new drugs badly, and we need incentives: discovery grants, extended patents, prizes, to lure other companies into making antibiotics again.
target language text: Necesitamos eses novos medicamentos con urxencia, e necesitamos incentivos: bolsas para os descubrimentos, patentes prolongadas, premios que atraian a outras empresas para volver facer antibióticos.
label: medicamento/medicamentos

source language text: And there's a bunch of drugs, not very exciting.
target language text: Ensíname a lista". E había medicamentos apenas interesantes,
label: medicamento/medicamentos

source language text: (Laughter) As a species, as humans, we like to say penguins are really cute, therefore, leopard seals eat them, so leopard seals are ugly and bad.
target language text: (Risas) Como humanos, gústanos decir que os pingüíns son moi feitiños, por iso, se as focas leopardo os comen, as focas leopardo son feas e malas.
label: mal/mala/malas/malo

source language text: You all know about multitasking. You all have been faulty of multitasking when you're driving and you pick up your cellphone. Bad idea. Very bad idea.
target language text: Todos vostedes oíron falar da multitarefa. Todos caen nela cando conducen e collen o móbil. Mala idea, moi mala.
label: mal/mala/malas/malo

source language text: This isn't science. This is just bad behavior."
target language text: Isto non é ciencia. Tan so é mal comportamento."
label: mal/mala/malas/malo

source language text: The reason I'm so passionate about ending race medicine isn't just because it's bad medicine.
target language text: A miña vehemencia para eliminar a medicina baseada na raza non só nace de que sexa mala medicina.
label: mal/mala/malas/malo

source language text: This wonderful cartoon in the New Yorker summarizes my whole talk: "I'm neither a good cop nor a bad cop, Jerome.
target language text: Esta estupenda viñeta do New Yorker resume toda a miña charla: "Nin son un poli bo nin un poli malo, Jerome.
label: mal/mala/malas/malo

source language text: Not all of them die; some of them survive, some more are surviving, but it's really bad news.
target language text: Non todas morren, algunhas sobreviven. Algunhas están sobrevivindo, mais é realmente unha mala noticia.
label: mal/mala/malas/malo

source language text: So as bad as all that is, things are going to get much worse -- much, much worse.
target language text: Por moi malo que pareza, as cousas van ir a peor, moito moito peor.
label: peor

source language text: It was published, it went viral, it proves that every single day online misogyny is a phenomenon endured by us all, all over the world, and when it is intersectional, it is worse.
target language text: Publicouse, foi viral, proba que cada día a misoxinia nas redes é un fenómeno que todos sufrimos, en todo o mundo, e cando é intersectorial é peor.
label: peor

source language text: That's not the bad news.
target language text: Iso non é o peor.
label: peor

source language text: And we're now running national education systems where mistakes are the worst thing you can make.
target language text: E temos agora sistemas nacionais de educación onde os erros son a peor cousa que se pode facer.
label: peor

source language text: Later in the camps, hospitals and through our online clinic that breaks down borders and overcomes languages.
target language text: despois, nos campos e hospitais e a través da nosa clínica en liña, que supera as fronteiras e as barreiras lingüísticas,
label: despois

source language text: A while later, I'm back in New York, and I draw this image of being stuck on the Brooklyn bridge in a traffic jam.
target language text: Tempo despois, de volta a Nova York representei neste debuxo a idea de quedar atoado nun atasco na ponte de Brooklyn.
label: despois

source language text: So finally, they decided to do a biopsy, and two weeks later, the results of the biopsy came back.
target language text: Á fin, decidiron facerlle unha biopsia e, dúas semanas despois, chegaron os resultados:
label: despois

source language text: And we included a unique matching system where if Mike's first victim had come forward, saved her record, entered into the matching system and named Mike, and Mike's second victim had done the same thing a few months later, they would have matched and the verified contact information of both survivors would have been sent to the authorities at the same time for investigation and follow up.
target language text: Incluímos un sistema de comparación único no cal, se a primeira vítima de Mike dese o paso, gardase o rexistro, o introducise no sistema de comparación, e identificase a Mike, e meses despois unha segunda vítima fixese o mesmo, estos datos cotexaríanse, e tras verificar a información de ambas as vítimas enviaríanselle ás autoridades á vez, para investigalos e facer o seguimento.
label: despois

source language text: She goes on a pill a day that targets a pathway, and again, I'm not sure if this pathway was in the system, in the cancer, but it targeted a pathway, and a month later, pow, that cancer's gone.
target language text: Seguiu tomando unha pastilla ao día que tiña un obxectivo concreto. Non sei seguro se o obxectivo estaba no sistema, no cancro, pero centrábase niso e un mes despois, (puf!)
label: despois

source language text: A year later, I was listening to all the noise about the Middle East conflict.
target language text: Un ano máis tarde estaba escoitando todo o ruído arredor do conflito en Oriente Próximo.
label: tarde

source language text: So this is what they were going to do in their trial: They were taking 3,000 children, they were going to give them these huge fish oil pills, six of them a day, and then, a year later, measure their school exam performance and compare their performance against what they predicted their exam performance would have been if they hadn't had the pills.
target language text: Isto é o que ían facer no seu ensaio. Ían coller 3 000 nenos, ían darlles unhas enormes pílulas de aceite de peixe, seis ao día, e un ano máis tarde, ían medir o rendemento escolar en exames e comparar ese rendemento co que eles calculaban que terían se non tomaran as pílulas.
label: tarde

source language text: And the later it fails, the worse the consequences.
target language text: E canto máis tarde falle, peores serán as consecuencias.
label: tarde

source language text: And I asked them, I said, "How many of you now show up to work later than you used to?"
target language text: Pregunteilles: "Cantos de vós chegades agora ao traballo máis tarde que antes?"
label: tarde

source language text: Later, when she found me alone, she apologized for overhearing that conversation, but told me that I was wrong.
target language text: Máis tarde, cando me atopou soa, desculpouse por escoitar a conversa, pero díxome que estaba enganada.
label: tarde
